M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.george.als.main.Game
The main method starts the application as a runnable and creates a new JFrame.
Map - Class in com.george.als.world
This calls holds all of the information about the current map It contains all the bugs, food, obctacles and nests on the map and is used to update each one.
Map() - Constructor for class com.george.als.world.Map
Default Class Constructor Used when reseting the map Or when loading a map from a file
Map(int, int) - Constructor for class com.george.als.world.Map
Class Constructor for a new USer defined configuration

meatImage - Static variable in class com.george.als.utils.Content
 
modifyBug(Map) - Static method in class com.george.als.utils.UserInput
Asks the user for the information about the bug to be modified
move(ALifeForm.Direction) - Method in class com.george.als.entities.lifeforms.ALifeForm
Moves the bug in a direction This method is called by moveToFood, moveToNest, moveToParent
moveToFood(Food) - Method in class com.george.als.entities.lifeforms.ALifeForm
Moves the bug to a food item on the map Uses the A* search algorithm
moveToNest(Nest) - Method in class com.george.als.entities.lifeforms.ALifeForm
Moves the bug to a nest on the map Uses the A* start search algorithm
